title: High Skill Disparity in the same ELO
body:
Hey all!

I just come of a session of LoL DynaQ, and i that is not the topic so please dont... you know?
So i really need some input from others, because the games were so onesided it was not even funny,
and it is not because of premades i think (1v1 firstbloods under 3min in lane etc)

Either the whole team stomps hard (and i mean S rating hard, got one with Aurelion and Swain, without much practice)
or all lanes lose, and i dont exclude myself, i also get DESTROYED in some games, in other games it feels like the enemy
is leagues below me, and when i check, they are all around silver I (my league)

So i would really appriciate some inpur as to why players so much better than me are stuck in my league, and players 
so much worse than me are also in my leage?!

In the end i would love to have a close game once a while, and i have had maybe 2 in the 70 ranked games this season...

have a good day all!

replies.body: If someone is considerably better than you, them most likely one or both of you won't be in that elo for long. You gotta start somewhere.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=o739nXT8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-26T22:35:52.288+0000)
>
> If someone is considerably better than you, them most likely one or both of you won't be in that elo for long. You gotta start somewhere.

but should the leagues not have settled in by now?

I have 183 games and I'm not settled yet, but that being said I only play every other weekend, and when I do, I play 24/7. I also started a bit late this season, because during preseason I got bored of the game because if a game is not competitive or has no reason for me to be playing I get bored, and don't try, so I started playing CS:GO, and got back into league a little while after the new season started, I never lost my love for the game though I still watched streams and videos, I'm weird. I also only play ranked games.

You said you were only 70 games in this season?  I played 300 games this season before I settled at S3.  Even then, some people learn what they are failing on, and shoot up the latter a bit, so there isn't a true point where the season will settle since people keep learning.
You probably deserve challenger but your teams are holding you back, many other players around this elo experience the same phenomenon.

> [{quoted}](name=FACE THE WlND,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=o739nXT8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-26T22:39:37.446+0000)
>
> You probably deserve challenger but your teams are holding you back, many other players around this elo experience the same phenomenon.

as i said i dont exclude myself from this observation,,,
Holy shit, do the boards not have a sense of humor? Wtf, this was sarcasm.
No one's better than each other. You're all bad.
